mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (custid, bookid, saleprice, orderdate) SELECT #{custId}, bookid, price, current_date FROM book WHERE bookid = #{bookId};
mapper.select: SELECT a.bookid AS bookId, a.price, a.bookname AS bookName, a.publisher FROM book A JOIN orders B ON a.bookid = b.bookid WHERE b.custid = #{custId} ORDER BY orderid DESC LIMIT #{sIdx} ,#{size}

SELECT a.orderId, a.custId, c.name, a.bookId , b.bookName, a.salePrice, a.orderDate FROM orders A JOIN book B ON a.bookid = b.bookid JOIN customer C ON a.custid = c.custid ORDER BY a.orderid DESC LIMIT #{sIdx} , #{size}
